001package com.example.util;
002
003import java.util.Objects;
004
005/**
006 * String-related helper methods.
007 *
008 * @author ChatGPT
009 * @since 1.0
010 */
011public final class Strings {
012    private Strings() { /* no instances */ }
013
014    /**
015     * Pads the given string on the left with the specified character until
016     * it reaches the target length.
017     *
018     * @param s the original string (not {@code null})
019     * @param ch the pad character
020     * @param targetLen the desired length (must be {@code >= 0})
021     * @return a new string with left padding applied; if {@code s} is
022     *         already at least {@code targetLen} long, it is returned unchanged
023     * @throws NullPointerException if {@code s} is {@code null}
024     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code targetLen < 0}
025     */
026    public static String leftPad(String s, char ch, int targetLen) {
027        Objects.requireNonNull(s, "s");
028        if (targetLen < 0) throw new IllegalArgumentException("targetLen < 0");
029        int diff = targetLen - s.length();
030        if (diff <= 0) return s;
031        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(targetLen);
032        for (int i = 0; i < diff; i++) sb.append(ch);
033        sb.append(s);
034        return sb.toString();
035    }
036}
